<div class="hide ttabs tabc">
<ul class="list pad2" style=" "><li class=""><div>1</div><div><span class="flag us"></span> <a href="rider/adrien-costa">COSTA Adrien</a></div><div class="right   ">18</div><div class="clear"></div></li>

<li class=""><div>3</div><div><span class="flag be"></span> <a href="rider/laurens-de-plus">DE PLUS Laurens</a></div><div class="right   ">20</div><div class="clear"></div></li>

  $(document).ready(function(){
    $(".sortriders li a").click(function(e){  e.preventDefault();  $('.ttabs').hide();  $(".sortriders li").removeClass('cur'); $(this).parent('li').addClass('cur');   $('.'+$(this).parent('li').attr('class').substr(0,4)).show();   });
    $('.expand-list').click(function(e){      $('.photos li').show();    }); 
  });
  </script>
